alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Holmes; Montgomery; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 10:40AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations less than one inch, sleet accumulations around two tenths of an inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Carroll, Montgomery, Webster and Holmes Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on dangerous road conditions, potential for power outages and dangerously low wind chills.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com, dotd.la.gov in Louisiana and idrivearkansas.com in Arkansas.
